sentences.sContent: I’m having trouble finding another job – everyone says I’m overqualified.
sentences.sCn: 我在找另一份工作，但遇到了困难——每个人都说我资历太高。

remMethod.val: over(过度) + qualified(有资格的) → 资历过高的

trans.tranCn: 条件太好地；超过合格之最低要求

trans.tranOther: if you are overqualified for a particular job, you have more experience or training than is needed
